name: Lloyd Lee
body:
###RECENT PROJECTS
- PlanItApp: (Rails, Backbone) | [live](http://betterplanit.herokuapp.com) | [code](http://github.com/leesungchul/PlanIt)
Social event planning website. RESTfully implemented backbone app . Drag and drop   functionality with multiple view listeners and hidden nested forms that create multiple associated models in a single transaction.

- Asteroids.js: (Javascript) | [code](http://github.com/leesungchul/AsteroidGame)
Copy of the original classic arcade game. Made with Javascript and HTML5. Calculates objectsâ€™ movement and detects collisions using vector algebra. 

- Snake.js: (Javascript) | [code](http://github.com/leesungchul/SnakeGame)
Another copy of a classic arcade game, but also implemented a tron-style gameplay mode that allows two-person pvp. 

- ActiveRecord Lite: (Ruby) | [code](http://github.com/leesungchul/ActiveRecordLite)
Built a Ruby on Rails Active Record clone with basic features such as mass-assignment and basic associations utilizing Ruby metaprogramming.


###LANGUAGES & TECHNOLOGIES
Ruby, Rails, Javascript, Backbone, SQL, Ajax, PostgreSQL, RSpec, HTML, CSS, Git, TDD


###EMPLOYMENT HISTORY
Mobile Kangaroo, Computer Technician (2013)
- Diagnosed and repaired computers, laptops, smartphones

Network Management, Assistant Manager (2007-2011)
- Worked with a team to provide excellent operational services in the gaming industry
- Instrumental in the identification and successful implementation of risk management policies
- Established and improved client relations.

University of California, Berkeley Systems Office, IT Support (2003-2004)
- Setup and maintained a network of thousands of computers
- Provided faculty with excellent technical support


###EDUCATION
University of California, Berkeley (2010)
-B.S. Environmental Economics and Policy

###MORE INFO
E-mail: leesungchul@gmail.com |
[LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/lloydsungchullee) |
